channel.title: How do you edit you virtual world/map/game? A.K.A move items and objects around
channel.description: Ok i have a server and client that work but the walls and doors are all over the place :confused: i am wondering if there is a way to be able to move objects in your virtual world/game/map. ;D plz ;D. if there is a way to do this could you please post a tutorial or a link to do it that works plz my server and client will be posted soon and i will give you mod+ rep if you help.

item.title: How do you edit you virtual world/map/game? A.K.A move items and objects around
item.dc:creator: @goblom10 goblom10
item.description:
@goblom10 wrote:

Ok i have a server and client that work but the walls and doors are all over the place i am wondering if there is a way to be able to move objects in your virtual world/game/map. ;D plz ;D. if there is a way to do this could you please post a tutorial or a link to do it that works plz my server and client will be posted soon and i will give you mod+ rep if you help.
